context_bundle.summary: Cargo package management with workspaces for monorepos, feature flags, build scripts, and dependency management

onboarding.quick_start: cargo new --lib mylib && cargo build --release && cargo publish --dry-run
common_patterns: Features: '[features] default = ["std"] std = [] no_std = [] in Cargo.toml'
Optional dependencies: 'serde = { version = "1.0", optional = true } in [dependencies]'
Dev dependencies: '[dev-dependencies] proptest = "1.0" for test-only dependencies'
Patch dependencies: '[patch.crates-io] my-crate = { path = "../my-crate" } for local development'
Publish: 'cargo publish --dry-run to test, cargo publish to publish to crates.io'
known_errors: workspace member not found: Check members list in root Cargo.toml, verify paths
feature not enabled: Add feature to default or enable with --features flag
build script failed: Check build.rs for errors, ensure required tools installed
dependency resolution failed: Run cargo update, check version constraints
publish failed: Ensure crate name available, add license and description
circular dependency: Refactor to break cycle, use feature flags
